title: Quote of the Day by Google CEO Sundar Pichai: 'It is important to follow your dreams and heart. Do something that excites you' - The Economic Times

title: Constellation Research on X: ".@Google’s @SundarPichai is 2025’s CEO of the Year. Steady leadership + bold AI vision = unmatched impact. Runners up: Arvind Krishna (@IBM), Sam Altman (@OpenAI). https://t.co/wL2xflpAp0 #Leadership #AI #EnterpriseAwards https://t.co/wztzXgnBNd" / X
